text: @PressSec @realDonaldTrump Dream on and listen to Little Donnie!  The POTUS downplayed the COVID-19 Virus from day one.  He refused to cooperative with the Governors and still not today.  I have heard from so many Republicans make the statement that they wouldn't WASTE THEIR VOTE ON HIM AGAIN!!
